alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 9:13AM CDT until May 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. .Due to recent rainfall from thunderstorms, the Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo is beginning to see a response. Anticipating a jump up to Action stage through the late week period, peaking in Minor flood stage across the weekend. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. Agricultural damage begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 17.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 18.8 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
